Text.val: 16.09.2014 GB SCR19157 Removed (CLNT404_WWWATOMATIC = 'Y') or (CLNT421_PERCAUTOMATICAPPROVAL <> 0) from CLNT selection

ExpSyntax.val: 'Admno'&{1,10}&'Clntno'&{1,10}&'Commercial Client Number'&{1,10}&'Legal Client Number'&{1,10}&'Client Name'&{1,10}&'Account Manager'&{1,10}&'Heller Group'&{1,10}&'Client type'&{1,10}&'Report credit notes in MQ 108 if higher than amount'&{1,10}&'Advance advice if availability'&{1,10}&'Priority'&{1,10}&'Calculation'&{1,10}&'Minimum amount of advice transfer'&{1,10}&'Maximum allowed amount of transfer'&{1,10}&'Transfer advances automatically'&{1,10}&'Additional instructions'&{1,10}&'Time'&{1,10}&'Maximum allowed invoice amount terms'&{1,10}&'Maximum allowed invoice amount as % of total client balance'&{1,10}&'If this Maximum allowed invoice amount is exceeded Reject Y/N (or Warn)'&{1,10}&'Pre-invoicing handling'&{1,10}&'Internal Limit'&{1,10}&'% automatic approval required below'&{1,10}&'Max. % new schedules'&{1,10}&'Max amount new schedules'&{1,10}&'Max debtor balance (legal level)'&{1,10}&'Start date contract'&{1,10}&'Termination date contract'&{1,10}&'Operational from'&{1,10}&'Status contract'&{1,10}&'Average amount of advance'&{1,10}&'Average amount debit note'&{1,10}&'Average amount credit note'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CMON_TOTAMOUNTADVANCESCLI) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_NADVANCESCLI) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWMAN + CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWMAN + CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_TOTAMOUNTADVANCESCRED) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CMON_NADVANCESCRED) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_MONTHNUMBER between :4 and :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6'
